query:
UPDATE nodes
            SET location_uuid = $1, backup_configuration_uuid = $2, name = $3,
                public = $4, description = $5, public_url = $6,
                url = $7, sftp_host = $8, sftp_port = $9,
                maintenance_message = $10, memory = $11, disk = $12
            WHERE nodes.uuid = $13
